title: Patient Management Module
summary: Implement end-to-end patient registration, listing, and management.
description:
This epic covers all aspects of patient management including:
- Patient registration and profile creation
- Patient listing and search functionality
- Patient profile updates and management
- Integration with appointment scheduling

## Goals
- Streamline patient onboarding process
- Provide comprehensive patient data management
- Enable quick patient lookup and access

## Constraints
- Must comply with healthcare data privacy regulations
- Should integrate with existing hospital systems
- Must support multi-tenant architecture
